comment.body: > [conquestofdough](#comment_1_1KNjYM4JH11GHLQkYf4dSNL59jqjMEFQG8): https://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion/html/  Duckduckgo doesn't personalize searches (that's what they say, the core is proprietary).  Better than google, although if you also want a decentralized search, use  YaCy (http://www.yacy.net/en/).  I haven't tried it yet, but I might try it out sometime.
